config.help:
You need to enable IPN Status & Enable IPN Version 2 and set Test Mode to Enabled if you are currently using it in test mode.
You need to enter Aler URL as http://yoursite.com/index.php?option=com_payinvoice&view=invoice&task=notify&processor=payza
You need to enter Aler URL as http://yoursite.com/index.php?option=com_paycart&view=cart&task=notify&processor=payza
If you are using it in Test mode then append string &test=1 in the above alert URL.
